0.text: The sun shines brightly. The children play happily.
0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>The <break time='200ms'/> sun <break time='200ms'/> shines <break time='200ms'/> brightly. <break time='200ms'/> The <break time='200ms'/> children <break time='200ms'/> play <break time='200ms'/> happily. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

1.text: • Some adverbs have the same form as adjectives.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>• <break time='200ms'/> Some <break time='200ms'/> adverbs <break time='200ms'/> have <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> same <break time='200ms'/> form <break time='200ms'/> as <break time='200ms'/> adjectives. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

2.text: - fast - early - hard - late - daily e.g. :- 1) Ramesh is a fast runner. (adjective) He ran fast. (adverb)
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>- <break time='200ms'/> fast <break time='200ms'/> - <break time='200ms'/> early <break time='200ms'/> - <break time='200ms'/> hard <break time='200ms'/> - <break time='200ms'/> late <break time='200ms'/> - <break time='200ms'/> daily <break time='200ms'/> e.g. <break time='200ms'/> :- <break time='200ms'/> 1) <break time='200ms'/> Ramesh <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> fast <break time='200ms'/> runner. <break time='200ms'/> (adjective) <break time='200ms'/> He <break time='200ms'/> ran <break time='200ms'/> fast. <break time='200ms'/> (adverb) <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

3.text: 2)It is a hard work. (adjective) She worked hard. (adverb)
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>2)It <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> hard <break time='200ms'/> work. <break time='200ms'/> (adjective) <break time='200ms'/> She <break time='200ms'/> worked <break time='200ms'/> hard. <break time='200ms'/> (adverb) <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

4.text: • Adverbs are formed mainly from adjectives by adding – ly.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>• <break time='200ms'/> Adverbs <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> formed <break time='200ms'/> mainly <break time='200ms'/> from <break time='200ms'/> adjectives <break time='200ms'/> by <break time='200ms'/> adding <break time='200ms'/> – <break time='200ms'/> ly. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

5.text: Adjective Adverb kind slow happy bad sad neat loud careful beautiful brave safe
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Adjective <break time='200ms'/> Adverb <break time='200ms'/> kind <break time='200ms'/> slow <break time='200ms'/> happy <break time='200ms'/> bad <break time='200ms'/> sad <break time='200ms'/> neat <break time='200ms'/> loud <break time='200ms'/> careful <break time='200ms'/> beautiful <break time='200ms'/> brave <break time='200ms'/> safe <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

6.text: kindly slowly happily badly sadly neatly loudly carefully beautifully bravely safely
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>kindly <break time='200ms'/> slowly <break time='200ms'/> happily <break time='200ms'/> badly <break time='200ms'/> sadly <break time='200ms'/> neatly <break time='200ms'/> loudly <break time='200ms'/> carefully <break time='200ms'/> beautifully <break time='200ms'/> bravely <break time='200ms'/> safely <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
